title: OMM 25:  Cultivating healthier habits of mind, for healthier happier living
dc:creator: Team Tham
description:
Today’s guest on the OMM show is one of very own on the wellness couch, Wendy Steward. Wendy shares with us all her insights throughout her journey towards healthier living. We learn some of the key mindfulness practices Wendy uses to increase her awareness and shift her habits in the direction of healthier, happier, more Listen In

The post OMM 25: Cultivating healthier habits of mind, for healthier happier living appeared first on The Wellness Couch.
content:encoded:
Today’s guest on the OMM show is one of very own on the wellness couch, Wendy Steward. Wendy shares with us all her insights throughout her journey towards healthier living. We learn some of the key mindfulness practices Wendy uses to increase her awareness and shift her habits in the direction of healthier, happier, more connected living. A really heart warming episode of hope and encouragement.

The post OMM 25: Cultivating healthier habits of mind, for healthier happier living appeared first on The Wellness Couch.
